items.title: Judge blocks Trump from deploying National Guard in Oregon
items.description: The judge, who was appointed by Trump, said the attempted deployment in Portland exceeded the president’s authority.

items.title: Trump pardons retired New York cop convicted of acting as Chinese agent
items.description: The former NYPD officer was sentenced to 18 months in prison in April on charges he stalked a New Jersey couple as part of a Chinese government plot.

items.title: On Trump’s urging, Justice Dept. investigating foreign meatpackers
items.description: Only a handful of large meatpackers control the industry in the U.S. as a result of consolidation.

items.title: Trump administration asks Supreme Court to block order on releasing SNAP benefits
items.description: A federal judge had directed the administration to release full benefits for November. The administration is appealing the order.

items.title: This North Carolina Democrat can’t win her district. So she’s running as a Republican.
items.description: In her crusade against gerrymandering, Kate Barr is challenging her Republican congressman in the GOP primary to make a point.
